2024 International Booker Prize

In the International Booker Prize list selected 13 books.

Broadlist has categorized these selections as:

  • Shortlist (6 books)
  • Winners (1 books)

Read more about how Broadlist categorizes lists.

Source: 2024 International Booker Prize

Short List

  • Crooked Plow by Itamar Vieira Junior

  • Kairos by Jenny Erpenbeck Buy on Bookshop →
  • Mater 2-10 by Hwang Sok

  • Not a River by Selva Almada

  • The Details by Ia Genberg

  • What I'd Rather Not Think About by Jente Posthuma

Winners

  • Kairos by Jenny Erpenbeck
